Recommendations: there should be a followup assessment on the needs and problem of the community for the purpose of replanning
student body should also be included and be participative in the planning process for each community extension program
issuance of special order moa and submission of tor are required for availment of getting the services of consultants experts
property document all the undertakings of the institutions with regards to the planning implementation evaluation assessment and re planning of community extension program
accomplishment reports should be submitted on time and properly marked by the records office to show authentication
proper documentation of budget utilization should be followed
the institution should venture into sourcing out additional funding and technical assistance form other agencies
the institution should properly document tracer on the utilization of technology knowledge skills learned and acquired by the training recipients
